title: Expense Management Revamped
changes: Replaced edit/delete buttons with a cleaner popover menu.
Introduced a modal for editing expenses to improve usability.
Moved category totals next to the category name for a cleaner look.
Improved date display to be more readable (e.g., '8th Tue').
Enhanced popover and modal to follow the application's light/dark theme.
Description is now optional when adding a new expense.
Introduced floating action button for faster expense entry.
Amounts are automatically rounded to two decimals.
Expense categories can now be renamed or deleted.
Added category management options inside the expense list.
Dark-mode toggle added for a better night experience.
New Split Calculator available from the sidebar.
